name: Eggsplosion
description:
Eggsplosion allows up to 4 players to compete through both Steam Remote Play and local multiplayer. You can play from your computer, tablet, phone or even TV! So make sure to get your friends together and make them eggsplode!
The game supports every major controller as well as (probably) almost all others!



Use one of the many power-ups to spice up your gameplay! The various different items and combinations allow for fresh and exciting experiences every session! The game currently holds the following power-ups:

  • Freeze Egg, freezes your opponents in place
  • Bounce Egg, will accumulate damage for every bounce so get your angles right!
  • Eggsplosive Egg, yeah this is the big one!
  • Wall Dash, allows you to dash through walls
  • Rapid Fire, removes the fire rate cap
  • Speed Boost, makes you go fast brrrrrrrr
  • Health Boost, will restore some of your health


Competitive Mode

Last one standing wins! In this mode all that counts is you surviving. Still, it might come in handy to eliminate your opponents while you're at it!

Casual Mode

Lean back and relax a bit! This mode allows you and your friends to customise the game to your liking. Choose a map, your favourite power-ups and decide on a winning condition. All that's left is having fun!
